En plus des bug répétitif qui te kick out de la file d'attente et plusieurs petits problème. C'est sur que je vais y rejoué mais je ne le conseil vraiment pas a quelqu'un qui n'aime pas perdre des partis sans cesse contre des gens OP

游戏是好游戏，玩法和游戏本身都挺喜欢的，但是我必须先给一个差评。
第一，游戏bug特别多，经常性遇到各种bug，比如卡墙里。
第二，这游戏的匹配机制很差，一个新手能匹配到满级，rank1的其他玩家，尤其是遇到屠夫。
第三，玩这游戏，10个里面能遇到至少4个开外挂的，屠夫透视，砍刀人不擦刀，随随便便一刀斩之类的简直到处都是，然而举报什么的一点用都没有，游戏公司根本就对这些开挂的睁一只眼闭一只眼。
完全影响游戏平衡性和娱乐性，希望游戏公司能重视玩家给予的回馈，并且及时处理，还大家一个公平的游戏环境

After watching countless Youtube videos of this game, I decided to try it for myself. I have to say I am now addicted to this game. Trying to escape the killer brings great thrill and throwing survivors onto meat hooks as the killer can give you a rush. Although the gameplay is great, there are many bugs that need to be fixed. I constantly have to reset my game because if I fail to find a game, I get stuck in an infinite loading screen. The bugs can make you angry but if you overlook them, the game is worth trying. Killers, survivors and maps are added just about every other month and can refresh the experience if things get bland. Overall a game that people should try even though its not for everyone and the glitches can really frustrate people.
великолепна

Playing "Dead by Daylight" gives you two options: survive, or kill. I have chosen the latter, and would strongly recommend this game if you are interested in killing other players. As a whole, the dev team works hard to balance the strengths of both "classes". Some of these balances are controversial and don't accomplish the goal 100%, but it does make for a fun game. The system of ranking in the game, ranging from 20 (low) to 1 (high), is decided by your performance in each game. Your rank goes up through obtaining pips, marks achieved through gaining 10k points throughout the 4 categories of each character. The reason I love this system, is that you can rank up without surviving or killing anybody. It gives you the ability to toy around with your victims as the killer, while still doing enough to pip. It allows for survivors to have good teamwork and help to recover each other and rank even without surviving themselves (surival being 5k points). Overall, I would recommend this game due to the fun it has brought and the competitive environment. I hope this overview/review has helped you in deciding whether or not you would like to buy this game!

Decided to play this again after 4 years since it first came out and see if the issues from once I first played have been resolved and improved, the quick answer is yes, a lot of the problems I had have been dealt with but there are still a few annoying things still stuck in the game.

When the game first came out it was a buggy mess, it's good to see that all the major game breaking bugs have been dealt with and besides one game with terrible lag I haven't noticed any bugs or connection issues.

This game is strongest with friends over coms to have some jokes or friendly taunting and if your on the survivors side some sort of communication feels like a must have.

I've played a few games on both sides and it does feel that the killer has more of an advantage. It just seems you need to grind out a lot of perks with different survivors to get the ones you want so you can something of a build going and being part of a team you have to work together (which should go without saying) but the killer only has to rely on themselves and what they are doing and not a team.

After a fair number of games on each side all I can say is the killer would win 4 out of 5 times if I played the killer or not and it did become frustrating when your playing the survivor side because of this.

Once enough perks have been unlocked and your mixed in with better players this will probably even out to where it becomes 50/50 but there is no doubt playing as the killer when you first start out is a lot easier.

But was it fun? Mostly yes or to say a lot better from once it first came, there are more killers, survivors and maps to choose from, a lot of perks to swap around (once you've unlocked them) and as I said earlier a lot of fun over coms.

Far from perfect but at least I can now give it a thumbs up instead of the thumbs down.

UPDATE - 1st of June, 2017

With the release of Friday the 13th: The Game, Dead By Daylight stepped up its pace. To my understanding, there have been a lot less crashes, bugs and the overall experience has been improved vastly. Personally I've encountered a few FPS drops here and there as well as animation lag, but there are too few to mention.

If you're a fan of asymmetrical horror gameplay, Dead by Daylight is pulling A-OK right now. If you considered purchasing the game before but decided not to, I can now recommend you to buy

4対1の非対称対戦マルチ、鬼役のキラーが4人のサバイバーを追い掛け回し、サバイバーはキラーの目を逃れつつマップ上の発電機を修理し、規定数修理し終えた後に出口から脱出を目指すという内容になっています。

ゲーム自体は大変面白いのですが2016/12/29現在いくつか重大なバグがあり、ゲームに支障を来たしています。
まず、大きなものではマッチングにバグがあり、JOIN A LOBBYでゲームを始めようとするとロード画面でロゴが脈打った状態で止まり、一向にゲームが始まらないというものです。これは通称ドックンバグと呼ばれており、このバグが起きると本人はロビーに入ることが出来ていないにも関わらず、他のプレイヤーからは入室出来ているように見え、このまま放置しておくとバグに見舞われたプレイヤーが欠けた状態でゲームが始まったり、永遠にロードが終わらないままになったりしてしまいます。
対策としては、サバイバー側でプレイする際は、SURVIVE WITH FRIENDSから始めるとバグが起きないようです。ただ一戦毎にいちいちこの手順を踏まなければならない為、若干面倒ではあります。それかバグが起きたらすぐゲームを終了させれば他の人の迷惑にはなりません。キラーはホストになる為、ロビーを立てる側となりますがロビーチャットはサバイバーにしか出来ませんので、ギリギリまで待ってもREADYを押さないサバイバーがいた場合はロビーを一旦解散した方が安心かもしれません。

また、その他、スキルやアイテム装備の制限を一部外せて仕舞うバグがあり、主にHILLBILLY以外のキャラがチェーンソーを持っている、サバイバーがTRAPPERの罠を持っている、優秀なスキルを重ね掛けしている、キラーがDWIGHTのBondやCLAUDETTEのEnpathyといったサバイバー側のスキルを持っている場合などが多いです。ネタ的な意味合いが強い場合もありますが大体がゲームバランスの壊れたマッチングになってしまいます、意図的にやらなければ起きないバグ利用ですので、このバグの利用者に当たってしまった場合は通報やブロックなどをお勧めします。

以上、バグの為に現在、ゲームの楽しさが損なわれてしまっている感がありますが、それでもドックンバグは回避できますし、悪質なバグ利用者はごく一部だと思われます。
ゲーム性は大変素晴らしく、最初はすぐにキラーに見つかり捕まってしまう、サバイバーが全然見つけられず脱出されてしまうと思いますが、何度かプレイしていくうちにコツがわかって来ます。キャラの成長要素もあり、スキルやアイテムの構成を工夫していくうちに自分なりのプレイ方法が確立してきます。
上手く逃げ延びられたり、サバイバーを捕まえたり出来るようになった時の喜びはひとしおです、是非ともプレイしてみて欲しいと思います。

追記：アプデが入り、細かなバグはまだ残っていますが上記2点のバグは解消されています。

After 3 years since I posted my initial review on DBD, I thought I'd return to the old one and update it. Has the game improved since 2016? Yes! Is it worth the current price? Ehh, maybe. I still would consider no, but this time, a soft no

DBD has fixed many issues over the years, and I can say that the game is more optimized and more fleshed out than it was 3 years ago. Reports actually do something now, connections are more stable, and there are considerably less times the game freezes up on you.

However, the game still has its issues, some of which still persists from launch. The infamous 'infinite loading screen' bug still occurs (although rarer today) forcing you to fore the close the game and restart. Despite having 'dedicated servers' the connections of lobbies are still mostly centered on the host's connection so if the hosts starts lagging, or lag switching, you're gonna feel it even if you joined a lobby with less than 150 MS. Community events are few and far between, and the early game hell is still very real, due to the huge number of killers in the game, and the lack of a proper tutorial. Queue times as killer can also be very long, and sometimes it can take up to 5 minutes just for the game to "create" the lobby.

It's not all bad, however those are the prominent issues with the game. Cosmetics are decent, and progression is manageable. My advice: Pick the game up during a free weekend or during a sale, and try ut out for yourself. If you can handle the connection and technical issues that come with it, then it is definitely a fun (and frustrating) game to enjoy!
